CustomField.formula: IF (!ISBLANK(Account__c), IF (Account__r.IsPersonAccount, IF (!ISNULL(TEXT(Account__r.Salutation)),TEXT(Account__r.Salutation) & " ",null) & Account__r.FirstName & " " & Account__r.LastName, Account__r.Name), IF (!ISNULL(TEXT(Contact__r.Salutation)),TEXT(Contact__r.Salutation) & " ",null) & Contact__r.FirstName & " " & Contact__r.LastName)
CustomField.label: Name
